main.name: Venkatesh Prasad
main.description: This is site is made with React JS, Hope you go through this site and if you think there is something needed to be updated, do give a feedback so that I could make it better.
main.bio: An efficient computer Science and Engineering major pursuing B.Tech in aiming to leverage proven communication, critical thinking and technical skills. I can be relied upon to help your company achieve it's goals.
main.contactmessage: To help me improve, you can contact me or send me a feedback given below.

works.title: Shubham matrimony
works.description: With a team of 5, we successfully made a static website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It includes home page, login, register, bride and groom category page, and payment page.

works.title: Personal Portfolio
works.description: This site was made with React JS. It includes my personal details, my profile, education, works, certifications and the feedback.

works.title: Tip Calculator
works.description: In this webpage, we can calculate the share between the group members whenever they are going to the restaurant, we can add the tip percentage from the total amount and can share among the group members, This site was made with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

certifications.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
